definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Longnan City in Gansu Province Wudu area a slight tremor was felt.
sentences.chinese: 甘肃陇南市武都区有轻微震感。

sentences.english: The quake was felt here too. Our building wobbled for a few minutes, which made me dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 上海有震感，我们大楼晃了几分钟，头晕得厉害。

sentences.english: A Xinhua correspondent in Taipei said strong tremor could be felt at around 2:11 am there.
sentences.chinese: 新华社驻台记者称2时05分在台北有震感。

sentences.english: The tremor was felt in many parts of neighbouring Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在缅甸的内陆交接国泰国，很多地区都有震感。

sentences.english: The tremor was also felt in Tokyo as well as Fukushima, Chiba, Kanagawa and Shizuoka prefectures.
sentences.chinese: 在东京，富岛，千叶，神奈川，静冈县均有震感。

sentences.english: Reports said the tremors were felt in Fiji's northeastern Lambasa and Savusavu areas.
sentences.chinese: 报导称，在斐济的东北部的L及S地区也有震感。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)
